text: is a Japanese handball player for C' Chartres Métropole handball and the Japanese national team.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male handball players Category:Japanese people of French descent Category:Sportspeople from Paris
